how to extract all zip files in one fold: time you learned to use the cli type unp pathtofilename in the terminal , if the file is in your home folder , right click on the file choose properties/permissions , check the executable , copy the filename from the title box and paste it after unp in the terminal, the file will uncompress into a folder in your /home dir
